thread.title: Nana Addo Is A Liar, His Leadership Will Be Diasatrous If He Becomes Prez  Kofi Adams
thread.title_full: Nana Addo Is A Liar, His Leadership Will Be Diasatrous If He Becomes Prez  Kofi Adams - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Nana Addo Is A Liar, His Leadership Will Be Diasatrous If He Becomes Prez  Kofi Adams
text: NDC ’s Kofi Adams has labeled NPP ’s presidential hopeful, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo as a “liar” – whose leadership as Ghana ’s president will be disastrous. To him, Nana Addo will be a reckless president if the electorates ever honours him
